columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the app service function app.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify an app service function app uniquely.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: Contains the kind of the resource.

columns.name: state
columns.description: Current state of the app.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the app service function app.

columns.name: client_affinity_enabled
columns.description: Specify whether client affinity is enabled.

columns.name: client_cert_enabled
columns.description: Specify whether client certificate authentication is enabled.

columns.name: default_site_hostname
columns.description: Default hostname of the app.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: Specify whether the app is enabled.

columns.name: host_name_disabled
columns.description: Specify whether the public hostnames of the app is disabled.

columns.name: https_only
columns.description: Specify whether configuring a web site to accept only https requests.

columns.name: outbound_ip_addresses
columns.description: List of IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access).

columns.name: possible_outbound_ip_addresses
columns.description: List of possible IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access).

columns.name: reserved
columns.description: Specify whether the app is reserved.

columns.name: host_names
columns.description: A list of hostnames associated with the app.

columns.name: auth_settings
columns.description: Describes the Authentication/Authorization settings of an app.

columns.name: configuration
columns.description: Describes the configuration of an app.

columns.name: site_config
columns.description: A map of all configuration for the app

columns.name: language_runtime_version
columns.description: The language runtime version of the app.

columns.name: language_runtime_type
columns.description: The language runtime type of the app.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
